flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: SEVIPER shares a generations-longnfeud with ZANGOOSE. The scars on itsnbody are evidence of vicious battles.fThis POKéMON attacks using its sword-nedged tail.
SEVIPER’s swordlike tail serves twonpurposes - it slashes foes and dousesnthem with secreted poison.fThis POKéMON will not give up its long-nrunning blood feud with ZANGOOSE.
SEVIPER and ZANGOOSE are eternal rivals.nIt counters a ZANGOOSE’s dazzling agilitynwith its swordlike tail, which also oozesna horrible poison.
It sharpens its swordlike tail on hardnrocks. It hides in tall grass and strikesnunwary prey with venomous fangs.
It sharpens its swordlike tail on hardnrocks. It hides in tall grass and strikesnunwary prey with venomous fangs.
For many generations, it hasnfeuded with ZANGOOSE. It whets itsnbladed tail on rocks for battle.
For many generations, it hasnfeuded with ZANGOOSE. It whets itsnbladed tail on rocks for battle.
For many generations, it hasnfeuded with ZANGOOSE. It whets itsnbladed tail on rocks for battle.
In battle, it uses its bladed tail toncounter any ZANGOOSE. It secretesna deadly venom in its tail.
In battle, it uses its bladed tail toncounter any ZANGOOSE. It secretesna deadly venom in its tail.
Le rival historique de Mangriff.nIl affûte la lame de sa queue nsur les rochers avant le combat.
For many generations, it hasnfeuded with Zangoose. It whets itsnbladed tail on rocks for battle.
Le rival historique de Mangriff.nIl affûte la lame de sa queue nsur les rochers avant le combat.
For many generations, it hasnfeuded with Zangoose. It whets itsnbladed tail on rocks for battle.
Constant polishing makes the edgenof the blade on its tail extremely sharp.nIt’s Zangoose’s archrival.
Constant polishing makes the edgenof the blade on its tail extremely sharp.nIt’s Zangoose’s archrival.
もうどくが　しみだしているnするどい　きれあじの　しっぽでnすばやい　ザングースに　たちむかう。
맹독이 배어 나오는n예리하고 잘 드는 꼬리로n재빠른 쟝고에게 맞선다.
Il rivalise avec Mangriff grâce à la lame affûtée densa queue qui sécrète un puissant venin.
Die flinken Angriffe von Sengo kontert es mitnseinem messerscharfen Schweif, aus dem Gift austritt.
Hace frente a Zangoose con su agilidad y su afiladancola, que está cargada con un veneno letal.
Respinge gli attacchi dell’agile Zangoose con lancoda affilatissima, che secerne un micidiale veleno.
In battle, it uses its bladed tail to counter anynZangoose. It secretes a deadly venom in its tail.
猛毒が　染み出しているn鋭い　切れ味の　尻尾でn素早い　ザングースに　立ち向かう。
しっぽの　かたなは　いつも　いわでnといでいるので　きれあじ　ばつぐん。nザングースとは　いんねんの　あいだ。
꼬리의 칼은 항상 바위로n갈고 있어 날카로움이 뛰어나다.n쟝고와는 사연이 깊은 사이다.
Il affûte la lame de sa queue sur des rochers pournla rendre bien tranchante. Le rival de longue datende Mangriff.
Es hält die Klinge an seinem Schweif scharf,nindem es sie ständig an Steinen wetzt. Es istnder Erzfeind von Sengo.
Le une una relación de enemistad con Zangoose.nSe lima con las rocas su cola en forma de espadanpara tenerla afilada.
Affila di continuo la lama della sua coda sulle roccenper renderla taglientissima. È un acerrimo nemico dinZangoose.
Constant polishing makes the edge of the blade onnits tail extremely sharp. It’s Zangoose’s archrival.
尻尾の　刀は　いつも　岩でn研いでいるので　切れ味　ばつぐん。nザングースとは　因縁の　あいだ。
せんぞだいだい　ザングースと　たたかってきた。nからだの　キズは　はげしい　たたかいの　しるし。nするどい　きれあじの　しっぽで　こうげきするぞ。
조상 대대로 쟝고와 싸워왔다.n몸의 상처는 격렬한 싸움의 증거다.n날카롭고 예리한 꼬리로 공격한다.
Séviper se querelle avec Mangriff depuis plusieurs générations.nSes cicatrices sont les preuves de ses nombreux combats.nCe Pokémon attaque à l’aide de sa queue, aiguisée commenune épée.
Vipitis lebt seit Generationen in Fehde mit Sengo.nDie Narben auf seinem Körper sind Zeugen grausamernKämpfe. Dieses Pokémon greift seine Gegner mit seinemnscharfkantigen Schweif an.

Seviper lleva años de gran enemistad con Zangoose. Lasncicatrices que tiene por todo el cuerpo dan buena muestra denlos encarnizados combates en los que se han enfrentado.nSeviper ataca usando su cola con forma de espada.
Da generazioni Seviper è in lotta contro Zangoose,nsuo nemico dichiarato. Le cicatrici sul suo corpo sono provendi scontri efferati. Questo Pokémon attacca usando la codana forma di spada.
Seviper shares a generations-long feud with Zangoose.nThe scars on its body are evidence of vicious battles.nThis Pokémon attacks using its sword-edged tail.
先祖代々　ザングースと　戦ってきた。n体の　キズは　激しい　戦いの　印。n鋭い　切れ味の　尻尾で　攻撃するぞ。
かたなの　ような　しっぽは　てきを　きりさくのとnどうじに　しみだした　もうどくを　あびせるぞ。nしゅくてき　ザングースと　たたかい　つづける。
칼과 같은 꼬리는 적을 베어 가르는n동시에 스며 나온 맹독을 끼얹는다.n숙적인 쟝고와 계속하여 싸운다.
La queue tranchante comme un sabre de Séviper andeux fonctions : elle peut frapper l’ennemi et lui injecternun poison qu’il sécrète. Ce Pokémon n’oublie jamaisnsa vieille rancune envers Mangriff.
Vipitis kann mit seinem Schweif Feinden einen Hieb versetzennund sie mit einem abgesonderten Gift bespritzen. DiesesnPokémon wird in der langwährenden Blutfehde mit Sengonnicht nachgeben.
Seviper tiene una cola que parece una espada y le sirve parandar un sablazo al enemigo y para envenenarlo. Este Pokémonnse mantiene firme en la enemistad que siente hacia Zangoose.
La coda a forma di spada di Seviper ha una duplice funzione:nlacera il nemico e gli inietta un potente veleno.nIl Pokémon non dimentica mai le lotte con il suo secolarennemico, Zangoose.
Seviper’s swordlike tail serves two purposes—it slashes foesnand douses them with secreted poison. This Pokémon will notngive up its long-running blood feud with Zangoose.
刀の　ような　尻尾は　敵を　切り裂くのとn同時に　染み出した　猛毒を　浴びせるぞ。n宿敵　ザングースと　戦い　続ける。
